articles.content:

articles.title: Tracey Emin feared she wouldn't make Christmas due to cancer battle - Daily Mail
articles.description: The British artist, 57, discovered she had a tumour in her bladder in June. Speaking on BBC Radio 4's Today, Miss Emin, who is now in remission, admitted she was 'happy to be alive'.
articles.content:
Tracey Emin has revealed she feels 'happy for the first time in her life' and 'wants to live forever' after fearing she would die before Christmas following her cancer diagnosis.
The British artist,… [+7921 chars]
